actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 3137) for the relief of William H. Spratling to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims, a bill for the relief of a named individual. Directs the Commissioner to report to the House of Representatives on the nature of the claim against the United States and the amount, if any, due such individual from the United States.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 3137) for the relief of William H. Spratling to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.
